channel.title: CVE Feed for craftcms -- cms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for craftcms -- cms

item.title: CVE-2024-41800|2024-07-25T16:12:58.907Z -- craftcms -- cms
item.description: Craft is a content management system (CMS). Craft CMS 5 allows reuse of TOTP tokens multiple times within the validity period. An attacker is able to re-submit a valid TOTP token to establish an authenticated session. This requires that the attacker has knowledge of the victim's credentials. This has been patched in Craft 5.2.3.
